name: Waves of Sorrow 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

This nightmare has been drowning you for a long time, but you will be surprised to find that this time there is a presence to guide you through this painful time. Overcome and grow together through four stages of grief by unlocking abilities to escape the rising waters.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Number of players: 1
